flawed_nl_solution:
Of the males with stripes, 40% are babies because 100 - 60 = <<100-60=40>>40
There are 10 males with stripes because 4 / 0.4 = <<4/0.4=10>>10
There are 40 males because 10 / (1/4) = <<10/(1/4)=40>>40
Males make up 40% of the pond's total, because 100 - 60 = <<100-60=40>>40
There are 1000 turtles in total 40 / 0.4 = <<40/0.4=1000>>1000
#### 1000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 1000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
